title: Big tech grapples with Russian state media, propaganda - Economic Times
content:
1. Big tech grapples with Russian state media, propaganda  Economic Times
  2. Ukraine War Tests the Power of Tech Giants  The New York Times

description: Google announced Tuesday that it's blocking the YouTube channels of those outlets in Europe "effective immediately" but acknowledged "it'll take time for our systems to fully ramp up."
